3: A-alright... Probably not going to work even if we retry it.
Do you have any other equipment that might help with the situation?
(Closes in) Commandant, I think it's about time we expand our tool repertoire for missions as well...
EMP... Would those be helpful in the current situation, Commandant?
Commandant, your answer's too hazy! Of course it's helpful!
But your uncertainty is understandable. I mean, you don't use these puppies that often!
And here I thought you had an actual idea...
EMP isn't going to be useful here.
Not just us, but also the Corrupted, and even the door, they're all built with EMP in mind.
Wasn't there a saying? Simple is best! Wait, is that how it goes? Anyway, no time to explain.
We just need to place them in a few critical locations...
It's all rubble around here... Are you trying to fry something through the walls?
Hahaha, you know your stuff, my technician Lee.
